title: loot capsule
body: when i leveled up recently the image of the capsule and the level up notification popped up but when i went to my loot i didnt have a capsule it shoulf be in the loot tab correct?

replies.body:
That's correct, it should be in your Loot tab!

I've seen a few players have this issue with their capsules not showing up after leveling. We're currently looking into what's causing this, but reaching to our Game Support team in [a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) will not only help us collect data, but it'll also get your hard earned capsule to your inventory.
